name: Spaghetti Carbonara
recipes: Cook spaghetti until al dente. Mix eggs and cheese in a bowl. Sauté pancetta until crispy. Toss spaghetti with pancetta, then remove from heat and stir in egg mixture. Season with black pepper and serve.
steps: Boil spaghetti in salted water until al dente.
Whisk eggs and parmesan cheese together in a bowl.
Cook pancetta in a skillet until crispy.
Drain spaghetti and mix with pancetta in the skillet.
Remove from heat and stir in the egg and cheese mixture.
Season with black pepper and serve immediately.

name: Chicken Adobo
recipes: Marinate chicken in soy sauce and garlic for 30 minutes. Simmer marinated chicken with vinegar, bay leaves, peppercorns, and sugar. Cook until sauce thickens.
steps: Marinate chicken with soy sauce and crushed garlic for 30 minutes.
Place marinated chicken in a pot and add vinegar, bay leaves, peppercorns, and sugar.
Simmer over medium heat until chicken is tender and sauce thickens.
Serve with steamed rice.

name: Sushi Rolls
recipes: Prepare sushi rice. Spread rice on nori sheet, add fillings, and roll tightly. Slice into pieces and serve with soy sauce and wasabi.
steps: Cook sushi rice according to package instructions and let cool.
Place a nori sheet shiny side down on a bamboo mat.
Spread a thin layer of rice over the nori.
Add fish, avocado, and cucumber as fillings.
Roll tightly using the bamboo mat and slice into bite-sized pieces.
Serve with soy sauce and wasabi.

name: Tacos
recipes: Cook ground beef with taco seasoning. Assemble tacos with tortillas, cooked beef, and desired toppings.
steps: Cook ground beef in a skillet with taco seasoning.
Warm tortillas in a pan or microwave.
Fill tortillas with cooked beef, chopped onion, diced tomato, shredded lettuce, and cheese.
Serve with salsa or sour cream, if desired.

name: Pancakes
recipes: Mix dry ingredients. Combine wet ingredients and mix with dry. Cook batter in a buttered skillet until golden brown.
steps: Mix flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt in a bowl.
Whisk milk, egg, and melted butter together.
Combine wet and dry ingredients to form a smooth batter.
Pour batter into a hot, buttered skillet and cook until bubbles form on the surface.
Flip and cook until golden brown on the other side.
Serve with syrup or your favorite toppings.

name: Bibimbap
recipes: Cook rice and sauté vegetables. Fry beef in soy sauce and garlic. Assemble in a bowl and top with egg and gochujang.
steps: Cook rice and set aside.
Sauté spinach, carrot, and zucchini in sesame oil.
Cook beef slices in soy sauce and garlic.
Assemble rice, vegetables, and beef in a bowl.
Top with a fried egg and a dollop of gochujang.

name: Tom Yum Soup
recipes: Boil broth with lemongrass, galangal, and lime leaves. Add shrimp, mushrooms, and seasonings. Simmer and serve hot.
steps: Bring chicken stock to a boil with lemongrass, galangal, and lime leaves.
Add mushrooms and simmer for 5 minutes.
Add shrimp and cook until they turn pink.
Season with fish sauce and chili paste.
Serve with a squeeze of lime.

name: Butter Chicken
recipes: Cook chicken in butter. Prepare tomato and cream sauce with spices. Simmer chicken in sauce until tender.
steps: Marinate chicken with spices and yogurt.
Cook chicken in butter until browned.
Prepare a sauce with tomatoes, cream, onion, and garlic.
Simmer chicken in the sauce for 20 minutes.
Serve with naan or rice.

name: Greek Salad
recipes: Chop vegetables and toss with feta, olives, olive oil, and oregano.
steps: Chop tomatoes, cucumber, and red onion.
Combine vegetables in a bowl with feta and olives.
Drizzle with olive oil and sprinkle with oregano.
Serve immediately.

name: Beef Stroganoff
recipes: Sauté beef and mushrooms. Make sauce with butter, flour, broth, and sour cream. Combine with beef and serve over noodles.
steps: Sauté beef strips in butter until browned.
Cook mushrooms and onions in the same pan.
Prepare a sauce with butter, flour, and beef broth.
Mix in sour cream and simmer with beef.
Serve over egg noodles or rice.

name: Pad Thai
recipes: Soak rice noodles. Stir-fry shrimp, egg, and sauce. Toss with noodles and bean sprouts.
steps: Soak rice noodles in water until soft.
Cook shrimp in a hot wok.
Add beaten egg and scramble.
Mix in tamarind paste, fish sauce, and noodles.
Toss with bean sprouts and crushed peanuts.
